statements: DELETE FROM ProductionReports WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01' AND efficiency_rating > 0.85;
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
DELETE FROM production_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND production_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND report_date >= '2022-03-15'
DELETE FROM ComplianceReports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM ComplianceReports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
DELETE FROM production_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM production_data WHERE production_quantity > 1000 AND production_time < '10:00:00';
